accomEditOptions.title: What do you want to do with the property?

answers.label: Deregister property
answers.info: This property will not longer be registered as accommodation, will no longer be liable for any related rules and taxes.

answers.label: Transfer property
answers.info: Make another person or organisation liable for this accommodation

answers.label: Property type
answers.info: What sort of accommodation it is, for example a hotel or campsite

accomDeregisterConfirm.description: You can register a property again at any time.

answers.label: No, keep it registered as accommodation

whatNext.title: What happens next

businessDate.title: What date will your properties stop being used as paid accommodation?
